entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Shamattawa
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Light snow and blowing snow ending in the evening then clearing. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 32. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023
